Package model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Product class is used to represent each product in the warehouses and stores.
    See Also:
